name: User selects to present attestations with the EUDI Wallet and scans QR-code
scenarioId: ios/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel_Book_reservation_by_presenting_attestations_remotely-Booking_Service-remote_cross_device_66/bookReservationCrossDevice:User selects to present attestations with the EUDI Wallet and scans QR-code
methodName: User selects to present attestations with the EUDI Wallet and scans QR-code

testSteps.description: Given the user has chosen to display the attestations using the EUDI Wallet
When the Booking Service displays a QR-code for the user to scan
And the user logs in successfully in the wallet app
Then the dashboard screen is displayed

userStory.storyName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.displayName: Booking Service Reservation with EUDI Wallet (cross device)
userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to book my reservation by present attestations from my EUDI Wallet to the requesting Relying Party (i.e. ‘Booking Service’)
  So that I can be authenticated by the Relying Party and book my reservation as part of my travel arrangements

title: User selects to present attestations with the EUDI Wallet and scans QR-code
